item.description:

。【原文：

Fed fixation notwithstanding, stock fundamentals matter, too, BlackRock’s Moore says

】

item.description:
油轮在科兹米诺（Kozmino ）码头停泊数日受阻

。【原文：

Tankers were prevented from mooring at the Kozmino terminal for several days

】

item.title: 纽约政治家再次推动解决主权债务危机
item.description: 纽约州的立法者们正在重新推动对解决主权债务危机这一漫长而痛苦的过程进行全面改革。【原文：New York state lawmakers are renewing the push to overhaul the protracted and painful process of solving sovereign debt crises.】

item.title: 英国将出售 2,650 亿英镑债务，基本符合市场预期
item.description: 英国政府宣布的下一财政年度借贷计划与市场预期基本一致，这为 2024 年迄今为止表现最差的主要债券市场之一提供了一些安慰。【原文：The UK government announced borrowing plans for the coming fiscal year that were broadly in line with the market’s expectations, providing some relief for one of the worst-performing major bond markets so far in 2024.】

item.title: 随着股价下滑，RWE 面临越来越大的回购股票压力
item.description: 分析师和激进投资者正加紧呼吁德国公用事业公司 RWE AG 回购股票并分拆其褐煤业务，以提振该公司低迷的股价。【原文：Analysts and activist investors are stepping up calls for German utility RWE AG to buy back shares and spin-off its lignite operations to bolster the company’s depressed stock price.】

item.title: 英国亨特将北海油气暴利税延长一年
item.description: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）表示，他将把对石油和天然气公司利润征收的暴利税延长一年。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt said he would extend the windfall tax on the profits of oil and gas companies by one year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔重申美联储需要对通胀有更多信心才能降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向立法者重申，在政策制定者确信他们赢得了与通胀的斗争之前，美国央行并不急于降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell reiterated to lawmakers that the US central bank is in no rush to cut interest rates until policymakers are convinced they have won their battle over inflation.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级养老基金在公开信中向首席执行官施压，要求增加国内投资
item.description: 近 100 位加拿大顶级商界领袖签署了一封致财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）及其省级同行的公开信，敦促他们改变养老基金的投资规则，以 "鼓励他们在加拿大投资"。【原文：Almost 100 top Canadian business leaders have signed an open letter to Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland and her provincial counterparts, urging them to change investment rules for pension funds to “encourage them to invest in Canada.”】

item.title: 阿根廷人向银行投入 23 亿美元，表明对米莱的信心
item.description: 自哈维尔-米莱总统于 12 月 10 日就职以来，阿根廷人已将超过 23 亿美元存入以美元计价的当地银行账户，这反映出阿根廷人对其政府的乐观态度。【原文：Argentines have deposited more than $2.3 billion into dollar-denominated local bank accounts since President Javier Milei took office Dec. 10, reflecting incipient optimism about his government.】

item.title: 道富银行将在四年后重开迪拜办事处
item.description: 在关闭位于迪拜金融区的办事处四年后，国泰君安公司（State Street Corp.【原文：State Street Corp. is set to reopen its Dubai office four years after shuttering its outpost in the city’s financial district in favor of neighboring Abu Dhabi.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注雪佛龙战胜埃克森完成赫斯交易
item.description: 在雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）10 月份收购赫斯公司（Hess Corp. ）的交易上押注数十亿美元的对冲基金经理们正坚持他们的赌注，尽管另一个障碍有可能会破坏这一收购。【原文：Hedge fund managers that wagered billions on Chevron Corp.’s October deal to buy Hess Corp. are sticking to their bets despite another roadblock that could potentially torpedo the acquisition.】

item.title: 石油行业因气候问题受到内部批评
item.description:
SLB老板 奥利维耶-勒佩赫（Olivier Le Peuch）希望在减少钻井、压裂和抽水产生的排放方面取得更快进展，但在评论中却绕过了范围3污染。【原文：

SLB boss Olivier Le Peuch wants faster progress in reducing emissions from drilling, fracking and pumping but bypasses Scope 3 pollution in comments.

】

item.title: 亨特称英国经济增长好于预期，支持保守党
item.description: 杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）表示，英国的经济增长将强于预算监督机构此前的预测，这将在今年晚些时候举行的大选前为执政党保守党带来鼓舞。【原文：Jeremy Hunt said UK growth is due to be stronger than previously forecast by the budget watchdog, a boost for the ruling Conservative Party ahead of an election expected later this year.】

item.title: 市场升温，鲍威尔与华尔街 "微妙共舞
item.description: 自从美联储开始收紧政策以来，杰罗姆-鲍威尔一直乐于忽视一种形式的通胀：资产价格上涨。【原文：Ever since the Federal Reserve began its policy-tightening campaign, Jerome Powell has been happy to ignore one form of inflation: Rising asset prices.】

item.title: 借贷成本高企，巴西工业产值年初下滑
item.description: 年初，巴西的工业产值大幅下降，这对未来几个月的经济增长前景是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：Brazil’s industrial output fell sharply at the beginning of the year, a worrying sign for the prospects of economic growth in the months ahead.】

item.title: 贝莱德经理预测银行风险转移交易将激增 40
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）预测，随着更严格的资本规定的实施，允许银行降低贷款组合风险的交易将快速增长。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is forecasting rapid growth for transactions that allow banks to shed risk in their loan portfolios as tougher capital rules take hold.】

item.title: 道达尔公司购入纳米比亚发现附近的南非石油区块
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）同意购买南非一个石油区块的经营权益，此前该公司在邻国纳米比亚附近海域发现了大量石油。【原文：TotalEnergies SE agreed to buy an operating interest in a South African oil block following significant discoveries off neighboring Namibia.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和乔-拜登（Joe Biden）顺利度过 "超级星期二"，比特币和黄金传递出混合信息，杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）前往国会山。夏洛特-休斯-摩根（Charlotte Hughes-Morgan）。【原文：Good morning. Donald Trump and Joe Biden sail through Super Tuesday, Bitcoin and gold send mixed messages and Jerome Powell heads to Capitol Hill. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Charlotte Hughes-Morgan.】

item.title: 土耳其在大选前加强对市场的控制以支持里拉
item.description: 土耳其央行在本月地方选举前正在加紧控制疲软的里拉，采取行政措施并呼吁商业贷款机构限制硬通货购买量。【原文：Turkey’s central bank is tightening its grip on the weakening lira before this month’s local elections, resorting to administrative measures as well as calls to commercial lenders aimed at capping hard-currency purchases.】

item.title: 据说 Advent 和 Carlyle 有意竞购德国连锁诊所 Sanecum
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括 Advent International 和 Carlyle Group Inc. 在内的收购公司正在权衡对德国医疗中心运营商 Sanecum Group 的出价。【原文：Buyout firms including Advent International and Carlyle Group Inc. are among parties weighing bids for Sanecum Group, an operator of medical centers in Germany, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺华分拆后明年将增加自由现金流
item.description: 通用电气公司（General Electric Co. ）的能源业务明年将产生多达 18 亿美元的自由现金流，这对于等待这家传奇企业集团解体的投资者来说是一个至关重要的衡量标准。【原文：General Electric Co.’s energy businesses should generate as much as $1.8 billion in free cash flow next year, a critical measure for investors awaiting a breakup of the storied conglomerate.】

item.title: 乌干达两年来首次紧急上调利率
item.description: 由于通胀前景恶化，乌干达央行在一次特别货币政策会议上提高了利率，以提振乌干达先令。【原文：Ugandan central bank lifted its interest rate at a special monetary policy meeting because of a worsening inflation outlook and to boost its shilling.】

item.title: 印度央行行长认为经济增长接近 8%，高于政府预测
item.description: 印度央行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度经济的增长速度可能会超过政府的预测，在截至 3 月份的财政年度里将达到接近 8%。【原文：India’s economy will likely grow faster than the government is predicting, reaching close to 8% in the fiscal year through March, central bank Governor Shaktikanta Das said.】

item.title: 中国证券监察机构誓言在 "市场失灵 "时采取行动
item.description: 中国证券监管机构表示，将在极端情况下采取行动解决 "市场失灵 "问题，并就何时采取行动遏制全球第二大股票市场的动荡做出了迄今为止最详细的承诺。【原文：China’s securities regulator said it will move to fix “market failures” in extreme cases, giving its most detailed pledge yet on when it acts to contain turmoil in the world’s second-largest stock market.】

item.title: 据说日本央行在调息前将对工资增长增强信心
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员对工资增长的力度越来越有信心，这一进展支持了交易员和经济学家的观点，即日本央行将在 3 月或 4 月取消负利率。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are getting more confident over the strength of wage growth, according to people familiar with the matter, a development that supports the view among traders and economists that the BOJ will scrap its negative interest rate in March or April.】

item.title: 意大利汽车零部件公司 Landi Renzo 寻求修改债务条款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汽车零部件供应商 Landi Renzo SpA 公司聘请 Mediobanca SpA 公司担任顾问，因为该公司正在考虑修改其银行债务条款，作为新业务计划的一部分。【原文：Auto parts supplier Landi Renzo SpA hired Mediobanca SpA as an adviser as it weighs amending its bank debt terms as part of a new business plan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 科威特财富基金押注美国股市后将迎来辉煌的一年
item.description: 科威特投资管理局管理着超过 8000 亿美元的政府基金，在市场大涨推动主权投资者获得两位数回报的背景下，该机构将迎来有史以来最好的财政年度之一。【原文：The Kuwait Investment Authority, which manages more than $800 billion in government funds, is poised for one of its best fiscal years on record amid a broad market rally that drove double-digit returns at the sovereign investor.】

item.title: 英伟达是刺激股价攀上新高的最新亮点
item.description:
今年到目前为止，大家最喜欢的人工智能游戏占了S&P涨幅的三分之一。【原文：

Everyone’s favorite AI play has accounted for a third of the S&P’s gain so far this year.

】

item.title: Signa Prime 接近慕尼黑交易，这是破产后的首次出售
item.description: 雷内-本科（Rene Benko）濒临破产的房地产集团 Signa 即将把慕尼黑市中心的一栋大楼出售给德国建筑业大亨阿方斯-多布林格（Alfons Doblinger），这将是该集团主要部门自 12 月申请破产以来的首次重大资产出售。【原文：Rene Benko’s ailing property group Signa is close to selling a building in downtown Munich to German construction tycoon Alfons Doblinger, in what would be the first major asset sale since its main units filed for insolvency in December.】
